mapper.select:
SELECT id, start_time AS `date`, title, content, start_time, end_time, remind_time, is_remind, wechat_remind, message_remind, pc_remind, app_remind, remark FROM `tb_oa_schedule` WHERE creator_account = #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND record_status = 1
and title like CONCAT('%', #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND MONTH (start_time) = MONTH (#{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) AND YEAR (start_time) = YEAR (#{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
AND start_time BETWEEN #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
